summary.en: BRM most commonly means Business Relationship Management/Manager in business and IT contexts; it can also refer to British Racing Motors in motorsport history.
summary.zh: BRM 最常见指业务/IT 语境下的“业务关系管理/业务关系经理”；在赛车语境中也可能指英国赛车制造商 British Racing Motors。

definition.en: an abbreviation for Business Relationship Management (or Business Relationship Manager): building and maintaining effective working relationships between a business and a service provider (often IT) so services match business needs
definition.zh: “业务关系管理”（或“业务关系经理”）的缩写：指在业务部门与服务提供方（常见为 IT）之间建立并维护合作关系，确保服务与业务需求一致

examples.en: BRM helped the IT team understand what the sales department actually needed.
examples.zh: BRM 帮助 IT 团队理解销售部门真正需要什么。

examples.en: She works in BRM, so she meets with business leaders every week.
examples.zh: 她在 BRM 岗位工作，所以每周都会与业务负责人开会。

definition.en: an abbreviation for British Racing Motors, a historic British motorsport team/manufacturer (especially known in Formula One history)
definition.zh: 英国赛车制造商/车队 British Racing Motors 的缩写（在一级方程式历史中较有名）

examples.en: The museum has a BRM car from the 1960s on display.
examples.zh: 博物馆里展出了一辆 1960 年代的 BRM 赛车。

definition.en: more generally, an abbreviation whose meaning depends on the field (for example, different companies may use BRM differently)
definition.zh: 更一般地说，BRM 也可能是不同领域/公司内部使用的缩写，具体含义取决于语境

examples.en: In this report, BRM is defined on the first page—check the glossary.
examples.zh: 在这份报告中，BRM 在第一页就有定义——去看术语表。

extraExplanation: BRM 通常需要靠上下文判断：在职场（尤其 IT 服务管理、ITIL 相关）里，最常见是 Business Relationship Management/Manager；在赛车语境里则可能指 British Racing Motors。
读到缩写时，实用技巧是先看同一段文字里是否出现 “IT services / stakeholders / business needs” 等词（更像业务关系管理），或出现 “F1 / racing / 1960s” 等词（更像赛车品牌）。
